0: The TBI confirmed at a press conference late Monday night that human remains found in Decatur County on Sunday belong to Holly Bobo. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR TBI Director Mark Gwyn offered his condolences to the Bobo family before making the announcement at the brief press conference. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR "In light of the recent discovery of possible human remains found in Decatur County, TBI has been able to confirm ... that the remains are of Holly Bobo," Gwyn said. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Newly elected District Attorney Matt Stowe then took the podium, saying he had just had a very difficult conversation with the Bobo family. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR "You can delay justice, but you can't deny it," Stowe said. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Gwyn and Stowe did not take questions. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Decatur County Sheriff Keith Byrd, who only took office days ago, took the podium several minutes later to discuss his role in the ongoing Bobo investigation. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Zachary Adams was arrested and charged with first-degree murder and especially aggravated kidnapping in connection with Bobo's disappearance earlier this year. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Byrd shared a message to anyone else who may be involved in Bobo's death. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR "You can run, but you can't hide. We'll figure out who you are, and you'll be brought to justice," Byrd said. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Another man, Jason Wayne Autry, has also been charged with kidnapping and murder in the case. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Jeffrey Pearcy and his stepbrother, Mark Pearcy, are both charged with tampering with evidence and accessory after the fact. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR "We are ready, willing and able to seek the death penalty in this case. We'll be making a decision sometime in the next couple weeks in conjunction with the Bobo family," Stowe said. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Byrd said the Bobo family is doing as well as can be expected. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR "The finding of her body was more of a relief than anything. They had already came to grips with the idea that she was dead, but tonight gave them some closure," Byrd said. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Two Benton County men discovered a human skull around 10 a.m. on Sunday while searching for ginseng. The pair found the remains in a remote, wooded area off of County Corner Road near Holladay. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR "This was divine intervention. God put those guys there to find the remains, and we acted on their findings," Byrd said. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Bobo
